import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; export default function PetInformation({ petInfo, onChange, onSubmit }) { const [newName, setNewName] = useState(petInfo.name); const [newType, setNewType] = useState(petInfo.type); const [newBreed, setNewBreed] = useState(petInfo.breed); const [newAge, setNewAge] = useState(petInfo.age); const [newWeight, setNewWeight] = useState(petInfo.weight); const [newImage, setNewImage] = useState(petInfo.image); return ( <>

Pet Information

Name {/* Type Age */} Pet Type setNewType(e.target.value)} required > Pet Age setNewAge(e.target.value)} required > Weight setNewWeight(e.target.value)} /> Breed setNewBreed(e.target.value)} /> Image setNewImage(e.target.value)} />
); }
